Text: <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Have you ever seen such a fish!?
I don't know if the jewel spurred its growth, but this is one of the biggest I've ever caught!
Thank you for looking after me, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! I must ask Pasasun if he knows anything about this amazing specimen.
Intruders detected. Initializing computational engine... Calculating optimal tactics.
Calculations complete. Deploying arcane measures to eliminate intruders.
Recalculating optimal tactics... Commencing terrestrial assault.
Threat assessment complete. Probable weaknesses determined.
Calculating directional tendencies of intruders... Altering variables.
Utilizing four fundamental operations to execute new stratagem. Solve or be eliminated.
Gods, that smarts! Seems I'm in over my head, so...good luck!
It flies! Like something out of a children's tale!
Remember me? I ain't the kind of scoundrel what shirks his debts, so I'll help you out─just this once.
Now we're even! So if you'll excuse me, I've got a treasure to plunder!
You in the habit of leavin' people for dead!? I'll make you wish those beasts finished me off!
Bloody─! Better escape while I still have my head!
Plenty of wind and water...just what I need to call my minions!
These are even nastier than the last! Don't let them take a bite out of you!

おつかれさま……！
あんたは本当に強いヒトだす！
You're here too!? Then I must be on the right track!
If it's all the same to you, I'll go on ahead. Mind keepin' my pet company in the meantime?
If you went down this path, that means the treasure's at the end of it!
Know if this thing eats? Well, you'll find out soon enough! That jewel is ours!
J-Just let us have the treasure, and no one needs to get hurt!
If you insist on staying the course, you'll have to deal with Quaqua. I can't guarantee your safety!
This beast is made from wood! Where did they find it!?
It conjured weapons from thin air!
More weapons! Those hammers look heavy enough to shatter stone!
It called monsters to its aid! Don't let them catch you!
Be careful! The flames move like waves!
So many of them! Where will you run to!?
Its arsenal is endless! Sisters protect me from those blades!
Lightning rains from the sky! We mustn't stand still!
Spears of water!? Oh gods, here they come!
The water is spilling forth! Can you manage, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>?
It's using the fetid water as a weapon!
Watch out! You don't want dirty water in your boots!
What are those orbs!?
Huh!? The statues are emitting light!
What!? The light swallowed the orbs!
The statues must house ancient power. I'm glad they're on our side.
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, look. Something's happening to the statues.
We made it. None of its weapons could match yours, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>.
What a wicked trap!
You saw right through her tricks! Well done!
More treasure chests...don't pick the wrong one!
Something tells me these toys aren't meant for children...
I saw it! Watch your step, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
This looks like a good spot to fish. Can we stop for a moment?
It's back where it was, like it never tried to murder us. Let's hope it stays that way...
Why can't they just leave us alone!? Be careful, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Hahaha! I knew you'd walk into my trap!
Not that way! Step there! There!
I'm graceful in all things, especially reloading!
Bang, Bang, BANG! Hah hah!
This is fun! So fun that I'll do it again!
This is what you were looking for, right? Treasure! But which one is the real thing?
Hahaha! Bad luck!
We have a winner! But you know...I don't think you deserve the prize!
Gather round, one and all! I've prepared a special gift for this very special day!
How did you like them? Find one that tickles your fancy?
Hahaha! I just love that sound!
No, no, no! You have to step on the cushion!
Now for the main event: darts! Hope you've been practicing!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, come on up! The grand prize is yours for the taking!
Hehehe... Round and round it goes─but where it stops, nobody knows!
Ahaha! A meteor upon your heads!
Your prize is...a giant hammer to the noggin!
Too bad! But don't despair─even losers get a prize!
Congratulations! You've been blessed by luck─now be blessed by me!
Waaahhh! I give up! I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I just wanted to have a little fun...
Finally, something to break the tedium.
It's so much better when they beg for their lives.
Open fire!
You'd look good with a few more holes!
Is fate your friend, or your foe?
Hehe, time for a new game.
Can you keep up?
Round and round!
You'll be my new puppets!
Oh, now I'm getting bored. No more games!
O dancer of the skies, hear me.
O wayfarer of land and sea, hear me.
O messenger from beyond the horizon, hear me.
These ships all ran aground... Not even Thavnair's stormy shores have claimed so many.
●とにかく、ここまで連れてきてくれて感謝だす！
What will you place on the pedestal?
The sparrow statue.
The turtle statue.
The whale statue.
Nothing.
Wh-Why would the statue attack us!? Perhaps we're not supposed to be here...
The birds are growing bigger and bigger! Is this the jewel's doing?
Just look at me! How could you deny such an innocent face?
Lost, are we? It's all right, I know the way. Trust in me and I'll guide you true!
I said I'd help. What more do you need?
Revising threat assessment... Integrating additional tactics into stratagem.
The statue grew! But how!?
It really is impressive, but I'd rather not wait around for it to try and squash us again.
I knew following you was the right move. Apologies, but I'm afraid the treasure is ours!
Huh? What happened to the mist?
Ah, the cushion broke your fall! How oddly considerate of her...
Oh my... The statue is carved into the tree itself! Could it be the Speaker Kalika serves!?
Show me what you're made of!
Water's in the air, and I'll bend it to my will!
Show me what you're made of!
In any other situation, these crystals would be enchanting.
That crystal is different from the others. I'd keep a wide berth if I were you!
A bubble seems to be holding one crystal aloft. We should keep an eye on that...
The bubbles make the crystals light as air. A single gust of wind will send them flying!
There he is again! He said he'd help us, but can we trust him?

<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>に恩返しをしに来たなんて、
あのヒト、意外と義理堅いだす。
There he is again! He doesn't look happy to see us...

まったく、厄介なヒトだっただす……。
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>、大丈夫だすか？
Watch out! The wind howls again!

泡がたくさん出てきただす！
当たらないように避けたほうがいいかも……？

こんなに手ごわい相手と戦えるなんて、
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>はやっぱり、すごいヒトだす……！
Are we the intruders!? What could we be intruding upon?
Are you feeling yourself, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>? Your eyes looked...empty.
The direction of its magicks don't match the patterns. What puzzle is it putting before us?
The researchers should be just ahead.<<key>>There─the building to the northeast.
So, ordinarily harmless creatures have grown savage...
Don't know what's got them riled up, but I'll take down any that thinks to try me!
Right, let's hunt our fill!
Look! Someone's in trouble!
Yaaargh! Taste my axe!
These animals are usually so docile...
You really are famous.
And for good reason, as you'll soon see for yourself.
Haha! Quite an interesting contraption you've got here!
Is that our petitioner? Let's go and have a chat.
I'll handle this!
Hmph. Is that all?
These claw marks... I've seen their like before.
Feathers... But did they belong to the predator or the prey?
Still fresh. Whatever this beast, it cannot be far.
It's starting to feel like a proper hunt!
So, how do you prefer our prey? Roasted or raw?
You presume it's even safe to eat...
Do you suppose they're upset we disturbed their home?
Who knows? But if they're spoiling for a fight, then they've got one!
Let's head back and report what we've found.
Talk all you like, bird! I'm going to have the last laugh!<<key>>Oh, I'm going to enjoy sinking my teeth into you!
I'm going to have the last laugh!
Gah! Shut up already, you blasted bird!
Shut up already! Shut up already!
I've never seen such an enormous colibri...
Not good... Quickly, gather together!
I've got you!
Spread out, everyone.
Hmph, that was hardly a tickle!
Hardly a tickle!
We have you now, you loud-mouthed bastard!
Loud-mouthed bastard!
Search for signs of your prey
Head toward the building to the northeast
Rescue the hard-pressed surveyor
Speak with the hard-pressed surveyor
Use the transport device
Speak with the concerned researcher
Defeat the rampaging animals
Survey the area for signs of your prey
Defeat the enraged animals
Speak with the concerned researcher
Defeat the giant colibri
Save your comrades
Defeat the giant colibri
Come on, let's pick up the creature's trail!
Continue surveying the area for signs of your prey
Continue surveying the area once more for signs of your prey
Clip the wings of the giant colibri
Arrive in the cloven crystal square
Clear the cloven crystal square
Arrive at the bloodied barbican
Clear the bloodied barbican
Arrive in the Carnelian Courtyard
Clear the Carnelian Courtyard
Hurry, Golbez! The city is already overrun!
They knew we were elsewhere. Cowards!
That they command such terrible beasts bodes ill... We've no time to lose!
This one is dangerous. Have care, Golbez.
That they command such terrible beasts bodes ill... We've no time to lose!
No, not the soldiers... Hells take them!
悪党どもを一掃するぞ、ゴルベーザ！
奴が首魁だな……逃がさんッ！

ここは兵たちに任せよう。
俺たちは先へ！

俺もメモリアの力を解放すべきか……
いや、それは奥の手だ。

さすがは英雄ゴルベーザ！
俺も負けてられん！
我ら二人に、敵う者などいない！
Such destruction... If only we had returned sooner...
First the villages, and now the capital... Nothing is exempt from their avarice.
I daresay we'll be faster if we split up.
この外道どもが……！
お前たちの好きにはさせん！
You are not worthy of your gift!
Who dares trespass in Lord Golbez's domain?
To me, O beacons of the Dark...
O Darkness, show them their folly!
Fools! There is no escape!
You cannot fend against what you cannot see!
Behold, the power of Darkness!
So be it. I will fight you with all my strength.
You are even stronger than before...
Even so, I'll not be bested. Not this day.
Come to your senses, Golbez! Remember who you are!
Do not give in to the darkness!
Aether to fortify my blade...
I need power. Light or Dark, it matters not!
You've weathered this before. Let's see how you fare now!
Even if I must blacken my heart, I will prevail!
It's over, my friend!
Still you stand... I'm not surprised.
Such savagery ill suits you.
No... I can't afford to...
Prepare yourself!
What have we here? Come to play hero, are you?
クソッ！　ここは一旦、退くぞ……！
How...? How could I...
Behold, the true power of memoria!
You find a discarded memoria crystal, and it suddenly begins to glow...
Go forth, my pets, and feast on their flesh!
Bested by Golbez and Durante both... It seems I...underestimated you...
Such...strength...
Defeat the Infernal Shadow
With me, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!

His flames grow hotter...
Watch yourself!
Shit! I can't move!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, buy me some time!
This...won't...hold me!
My thanks.

...On your guard.
He means to unleash hell!

すべてを潰すつもりか！？
あのまま、振り下ろさせるわけには……！
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Still in the fight?

These blades, they're feeding him power...
But not if we break them!

Still with me, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>?
Let's finish this!
Stay sharp─you can evade the worst of his blows!

Well done.
Now it's your turn!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, no!
I've failed...

There's too damn many!
We cannot rely on steel alone...

Just a few more, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
We leave none standing!
From dreams of endless Dark, I awaken.
O stifled Darkness in moon abiding...
Coalesce and consume creation!
My Darkness shall devour all Light.
You shall know no hope, nor salvation!
I shall rend the very walls of reality!
Further! I must go further!
Beyond the veil my home doth lie...
What is this place? Wherefore am I here?
Stand aside, I beseech you.
I wish but to return home.
In my memory the stars yet shine, attending the moon...
Bright as stars in the night.
Her will...my will...shall not be denied.
The time is come to rejoin the great flow.
By my power shall all know salvation!
To the last you would deny my heart's desire...
Your flesh shall melt and seethe!
Begone, contemptible Light!
This world is beyond salvation.
'Tis time to set forth─for warmth and radiance!
Your souls are mine!
Ah, the Darkness! It riseth!
All are as one in Darkness.
Be at peace in oblivion.
In Darkness be steeped.
At the heart of primordial Darkness...
The kindling of life's spark...
The glory of creation!
Oh, to look upon such splendor once more...
Return to me, my beloved star!
All who oppose me shall be consigned to nothingness.
In endless Dark embrace your end.
